message: This is the first product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. Please let me know if you're interested.
I'll buy the product

You bought the first product for $1000000. I'm willing to sell the second product for the same price. However, I want to warn you that I'm not sure if this one is any better. Would you like to take the risk and buy it?
I'll pass on this one, I'm not feeling lucky

I understand you're being cautious. I'll offer you a deal: if you buy this product and it's high-quality, I'll give you a special discount on the next product. But if it's low-quality, you'll still pay the full price of $1000000. What do you say?
I'll take the risk, but only if I can get a discount on the next product if it's high-quality
